entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, macOS] Text in the Editor control disappeared when reducing the Scale of the Editor control #24583
  • [Android] WindowSoftInputModeAdjust.Resize causes focus to return to original page after resuming from sleep #24581
  • [MAUI] Navigating to 'My Recipes' shows blank page #24580
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CollectionView Infinite Scroll Bug : Scroll Resets to First Item at End #24578
  • [Binding SG] Add delegates support #24577
    .NET 10 Planning
  • when I create a new project and search for MAUI i am getting this, even afte modifying installer #24576

Closed

  • iOS/Mac Catalyst - UNNotificationInterruptionLevel Values Incorrect (Apply same fix to Maui as for Xamarin) #24590
  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating lag before drawn 1 frame after other elements #23688
  • iOS animated border #24104
    Backlog
  • Shadows not rendering as expected on Android and iOS #24414
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [iOS] SafeArea arrange insets are currently insetting based on an incorrect Bounds #24246
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [ANDROID] Requesting Read-Write External Storage in .net 7 not working #14729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Blazor Hybrid - Android - Keyboard covers UI despite having resize soft keyboard setting #24573
  • Migratiing OnPlatform from Xamarin to MAUI proyect #24542
  • Bug Has Returned - MAUI iOS Splash Screen Not Updated After First Install #24562
  • Voice over is not announcing the status message as result found when results are found and visible status message when result is not fond for search recipe edit filed : A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_Search box_screen reader #22971
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Programmatic name is not given for "Hamburger" button: A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppHomeScreen_Home Screen_AI4MAC #22904
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Control type is not given for recipes appear in collection after searching for recipe: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App Recipes Search_Recipe Screen_AI4MAC #22962
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve keyboard scrolling with editors, contentInsets, and different keyboards #24589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview, area-keyboard
  • Revert "Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false" #24588
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Split off HandlerDoesNotLeak.DatePicker into its own UI test #24585
    area-testing
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨
  • [C] avoid concurrent access to _values #24579

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1]Update android version #24584
  • Fix shadow consistency on Android and iOS #24415
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #23729
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Always return Granted for Read-Write Storage permissions on Android #23909
    area-essentials
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc.1] Update sdk rc1 #24574
  • fix ICanvas.ClipPath documentation #24560
    community ✨
  • [X] do not look for parent DataType on collections #24513
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Upgrade Windows App SDK from 1.5.5 to 1.5.6 #24328
    area-infrastructure, community ✨

Updated

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #24523
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, do-not-merge, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • [Windows] Add `WindowsBatchPropertyMapper` to save unnecessary work when initializing views #24417
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Skip initial assignments in property mapper (take 3) #23987
    community ✨
  • [ProfiledAOT] Update workflow to profile apps #24546
  • RefreshView IsEnabled enhancements #24290
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Avoid recomputing bindings multiple times and bind BindingContext first #24553
    community ✨
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Application Crash Due to Incorrect Use of <ReorderableItemsView> Instead of <CollectionView> for Reordering Items - fix #23221
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Added Google Cloud Map Styles support for Android. #24526
    community ✨, area-controls-map
  • Fix App Theme Binding For Non Elements #24465
    community ✨, area-theme
  • [X] Dont SetBinding for values returned by OnIdiom #23272
    area-xaml
  • [Android] [iOS] [macOS] ContentView and ScrollView also need to handle InputTransparent #21025
    stale, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [Android] Fix for Scrolling of Editor placed in ScollView issue #24531
    community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix Android flyout button (burger) visibility not reevaluated when orientation changes #24469
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-theme
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • Fix for the Nested Entry View In A Frame Causes Crash #24543
    community ✨
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
